resources.string: Please enter already used mobile data of current session e.g the value from the app Settings or the real value from your service provider.
Cycle for mobile data and calls
Please enter the day of month when the mobile data measurement shall start.
Data usage cycle will be reset on:
The entered change day is not within a

-days cycle.

The calculation of the used free minutes and the data consumption can not be carried out correctly.

Please correct the change day.
High speed limit for mobile data
Please enter the threshold value when you want to get a warning (e.g. the value of your high speed flat rate)
High speed limit for mobile data is:
Please enter the already used free minutes.
please enter number including international aerea code
Enter the phone numbers which are free of charge by your mobile contract.
Please mark the numbers to be deleted and confirm with apply

Capricorn has no access to your contacts.\n If you want you can enter here phone numbers which are free of charge for you.\n Capricorn will not use calls to this numbers to calculate your used free minutes.

Capricorn does not forward these numbers to any third party, does not know the owner of these numbers and will use these numbers only for the internal calculations.\n Therefore these numbers are not person related data for Capricorn
After de-installation of Capricorn all data inclusive these phone numbers will be deleted entirely.
Please enter the value for your free minutes when you want to get a warning(e.g. the value of the free minutes from your contract)
